title: DHFL loan scam case: HC asks CBI to file status report on Kapil Wadhawan's bail plea
description: The Delhi High Court has directed the CBI to file a status report on Kapil Wadhawan's bail plea concerning the DHFL bank loan scam. The CBI is to address objections regarding the petition's maintainability, with further hearings set for November 7.
